ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and we did not feed the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And did not feed the needy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and we did not feed the poor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: nor did we feed the destitute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nor did we feed the poor;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And we used not to feed the poor;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nor did we feed the wretched.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and we did not feed the poor;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we have not been feeding the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Nor did we feed the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor were we of those who fed the indigent;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nor we used to feed Al-Miskin (the poor);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and we did not feed the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nor did we feed the destitute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Nor did we used to feed the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:44] Nor did we [ever] feed the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nor did we feed the wretched) we did not encourage giving alms to the needy nor were we among those who gave the poor-due or alms.
